title: CAN'T LOG IN THIS NA SERVER
body:
First, I can't use English well. please consider it...
I tried to log in NA server from 1p.m.(UTC+09:00) after patch,  and success that(I have been played this laptop and normally worked)
but soon my client was quit and can't make progress after that.
And tried using Hextech Repair Tool and something other notified in https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#section-windows
and did reinstall this game.
but doesn't work all of them. 
Why i can't do that. I have played LoL with this laptop almost 2years....
I think its not problem on my laptop. and RIOT's server is working now...
what is the problem.?
Please someone help me.

replies.body:
Are you still having issues logging in? If so, this may be caused by a number of IE security settings or network settings that are local to your PC. I recommend working through the steps that can be found in our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change.

Me too.

Here's what I can't understand.  Why does the server status show "green" when so many people are getting screwed by the server crap?

me either. :( 

RIOT PLS!! I did even reinstall and check my network for nearly 3 hours.. let me in pls!!
